name: Light Keeper
description:
Use W or S to move and Space to illuminate. Don't forget to use your points!!

Game created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2018.

That is the second game created by our team! Hope you enjoy!!

Created by: 

Anderson Machado de Oliveira- Art and Design

Evandro Machado Pereira - Programing

A Brazilian team named Axe Team! Go Brazil!
